comments.content:
'sudo: dhcp_release: command not found
if your OS is ubuntu,then you need to install dnsmasq-utils which contains  dhcp_release  .
I am not sure  which package contains  dhcp_release  tool  in  RedHat  or CentOS  ,
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~heut2008
